headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This Week on the Podium: The Coil Raiden
content:
The Diamond Casino & Resort rewards all sorts of behaviors: drinking, visiting the track, roulette, among other things. Stop by the Lucky Wheel in the lobby and you might be rewarded with GTA$, RP, clothing, accessories, snacks, and myriad mystery prizes.

This week on the podium? So glad you asked: the Coil Raiden, a whisper-quiet electric sports car that disrupted our ideas of electricity, sports, and cars upon its release.
